cyclone.name: ZETA
cyclone.current_location: about 450 mi south of the mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: Turning north, then north-northeast across the central Gulf, tracking toward the northern Gulf Coast (southeastern Louisiana–Mississippi coast) late Wednesday, then accelerating inland across the southeastern U.S.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southeastern Louisiana coast near Morgan City

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from west of Morgan City LA to Intracoastal City LA
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Morgan City LA to MS/AL border; Tropical Storm Warning MS/AL border to Okaloosa/Walton County Line FL; Storm Surge Warning Mouth of Atchafalaya River LA to Navarre FL including Lake Pontchartrain and Mobile Bay
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast from southeastern Louisiana eastward to the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤3%) of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusts possible Wednesday night.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected on the Texas coast west of Cameron.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain bands may bring 1–2 inches of rain Wednesday night into Thursday.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None of significance expected for port operations at Beaumont, TX.
